io.spine.server.commandbus

Class CommandSequence<R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder,S extends CommandSequence<R,B,S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandSequence<R,B,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of the result generated when the command sequence is posted
    B - the type of the result builder
    S - the type of the sequence for the return type covariance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandSequence.Split, CommandSequence.Transform

    @Internal
public abstract class CommandSequence<R extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder,S extends CommandSequence<R,B,S>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A sequence of commands to be posted to CommandBus.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CommandSequence.ErrorHandler
      A callback for errors occurred during posting a command from the sequence to the CommandBus.
      static class  CommandSequence.Split
      A CommandSequence of two or more commands which is generated in response to a source command.
      static class  CommandSequence.Transform
      A command sequence containing only one element

        public static CommandSequence.Split split(com.google.protobuf.Message commandMessage,
                                          io.spine.core.CommandContext context,
                                          CommandBus bus)
        Creates a sequence for splitting the source command into several ones.
        Parameters:
        commandMessage - the message of the source command
        context - the context of the source command
        bus - the command bus to post commands
        Returns:
        new empty sequence

        Parameters:
        commandMessage - the message of the source command
        context - the context of the source command

        Returns:

      • add

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
protected S add(com.google.protobuf.Message commandMessage)
        Adds a command message to the sequence of commands to be posted.

      • onError

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public S onError(CommandSequence.ErrorHandler handler)
        Defines a custom handler for posting errors.

        When the handler is not defined CommandPostingException will be thrown if an error occurs.

      • size

        protected int size()
        Obtains the size of the command sequence.

      • postAll

        protected R postAll()
        Posts all commands to the CommandBus in the order that they were added.

        The size of the sequence after this method is zero if all the commands were posted successfully.

        Returns:
        the result
